Name: HandBrake
Overview: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.

WEB Port for GUI.Name: WEB Port for GUI
WEB Port for GUI.Description: Port used to access the application's GUI via the web interface.<br><b>NOTE:</b> This applies only when <i>Network Type</i> is set to <i>Bridge</i>.  For other network types, port 5800 should be used instead.

VNC Port for GUI.Name: VNC Port for GUI
VNC Port for GUI.Description: Port used to access the application's GUI via the VNC protocol.  Optional if no VNC client is used.<br><b>NOTE:</b> This applies only when <i>Network Type</i> is set to <i>Bridge</i>.  For other network types, port 5900 should be used instead.

User ID.Name: User ID
User ID.Description: ID of the user the application runs as.

Group ID.Name: Group ID
Group ID.Description: ID of the group the application runs as.

Umask.Name: Umask
Umask.Description: Mask that controls how file permissions are set for newly created files. The value of the mask is in octal notation.

Niceness (priority).Name: Niceness (priority)
Niceness (priority).Description: Priority at which the application should run.  A niceness value of -20 is the highest priority and 19 is the lowest priority.<br><b>NOTE:</b> Setting a negative value requires additional permissions.  Thus, <i><b>--cap-add=SYS_NICE</b></i> must be added in <i>Extra Parameters</i> (shown when <i>Advanced View</i> is enabled).

Display Width.Name: Display Width
Display Width.Description: Width (in pixels) of the application's window.

Display Height.Name: Display Height
Display Height.Description: Height (in pixels) of the application's window.

Secure Connection.Name: Secure Connection
Secure Connection.Description: Whether or not an encrypted connection should be used to access the application's GUI.  Set to <i><b>1</b></i> to encrypt the connection.<br><span style='color: red;'><b>Note:</b></span> When enabling the secure connection, security parameters needs to be generated.  This <b>one-time</b> operation is done during container startup.  Depending on your system, this could take a few minutes.  GUI of the application won't be available until the operation completes.

Extra x11vnc Options.Name: Extra x11vnc Options
Extra x11vnc Options.Description: Extra options to pass to the x11vnc server running in the Docker container.<br><span style='color: red;'><b>Warning:</b></span> For advanced users. Do not use unless you know what you are doing.

Automatic Video Converter: Preset.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Preset
Automatic Video Converter: Preset.Description: Preset used by the automatic video converter.  Identification of the preset must follow the format 'CATEGORY/PRESET NAME'.  Name of all available presets can be seen via the HandBrake GUI.

Automatic Video Converter: Format.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Format
Automatic Video Converter: Format.Description: Video container format used by the automatic video converter for output files.  This is typically the video filename extension.

Automatic Video Converter: Keep Source F.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Keep Source Files
Automatic Video Converter: Keep Source F.Description: Set to 0 to remove successfully converted videos from the watch folder, 1 to keep them.

Automatic Video Converter: Video File Ex.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Video File Extensions
Automatic Video Converter: Video File Ex.Description: Space-separated list of file extensions to be considered as video files.  By default, this list is empty, meaning that the automatic video converter will let HandBrake automatically detects if a file, no matter its extension, is a video or not (note that extensions defined by the <i>Non-Video File Extensions</i> list are always considered as non-video files).  Normally, this variable doesn't need to be set.  Usage of this variable is useful when only specific video files need to converted.

Automatic Video Converter: Non-Video Fil.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Non-Video File Action
Automatic Video Converter: Non-Video Fil.Description: Set to <b><i>ignore</i></b> to ignore non-video files from the watch folder, or set to <b><i>copy</i></b> to copy them as-is to the output folder.

Automatic Video Converter: Non-Video Fil.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Non-Video File Extensions
Automatic Video Converter: Non-Video Fil.Default: jpg jpeg bmp png gif txt nfo
Automatic Video Converter: Non-Video Fil.Description: Space-separated list of file extensions to be considered as not being videos.  Most non-video files are properly rejected by HandBrake.  However, some files, like images, are convertible by HandBrake even if they are not video files.

Automatic Video Converter: Output direct.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Output directory
Automatic Video Converter: Output direct.Description: Root directory where converted videos should be written.

Automatic Video Converter: Output Subdir.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Output Subdirectory
Automatic Video Converter: Output Subdir.Description: Subdirectory of the output folder into which converted videos should be written.<ul><li>Leave value empty to save converted videos directly into <b><i>/output/</i></b>.</li><li>Use the special value <b><i>SAME_AS_SRC</i></b> to use the same subfolder as the source.  For example, if the video source file is <b><i>/watch/Movies/mymovie.mkv</i></b>, the converted video will be written to <b><i>/output/Movies/</i></b>.</li><li>Use any subfolder name.  For example, setting the value <b><i>Home/Movies</i></b> will make converted videos written to <b><i>/output/Home/Movies</i></b>/</li></ul>

Automatic Video Converter: Overwrite Des.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Overwrite Destination
Automatic Video Converter: Overwrite Des.Description: Setting this to 1 allows the final destination file to be overwritten if it already exists.

Automatic Video Converter: Source File S.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Source File Stable Time
Automatic Video Converter: Source File S.Description: Time (in seconds) during which properties (e.g. size, time, etc) of a video file in the watch folder need to remain the same.  This is to avoid processing a file that is being copied.

Automatic Video Converter: Minimum Title.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Minimum Title Duration
Automatic Video Converter: Minimum Title.Description: Minimum title duration (in seconds).  Shorter titles will be ignored.  This applies only to video disc sources (ISO file, <i>VIDEO_TS</i> folder or <i>BDMV</i> folder).

Automatic Video Converter: Check Interva.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Check Interval
Automatic Video Converter: Check Interva.Description: Interval (in seconds) at which the automatic video converter checks for new files.

Automatic Video Converter: Number of Wat.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Number of Watch Folders
Automatic Video Converter: Number of Wat.Description: Maximum number of watch folders handled by the automatic video converter.

Automatic Video Converter: Disable Progr.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Disable Progress in GUI
Automatic Video Converter: Disable Progr.Description: Set to 1 to disable display of the video conversion progress in HandBrake GUI.

Automatic Video Converter: Custom HandBr.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Custom HandBrake Arguments
Automatic Video Converter: Custom HandBr.Description: Custom arguments to pass to HandBrake when performing a conversion.

Automatic Video Converter: Install Packa.Name: Automatic Video Converter: Install Packages
Automatic Video Converter: Install Packa.Description: Space-separated list of Alpine Linux packages to install.  This is useful when the automatic video converter's hooks require requires tools not available in the container image.  See <i>https://pkgs.alpinelinux.org</i> for the list of available Alpine Linux packages.

Config Directory.Name: Config Directory
Config Directory.Description: This is where the application stores its configuration, log and any files needing persistency.<br>Container path: /config

Storage.Name: Storage
Storage.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /storage

Watch Directory.Name: Watch Directory
Watch Directory.Description: This is the watch folder of the automatic video converter.  Any video copied into this folder will be automatically converted by HandBrake.<br>Container path: /watch

Output Directory.Name: Output Directory
Output Directory.Description: This is the default output folder for converted videos.  Also used by the automatic video converter.<br>Container path: /output
